verses.name: Jeremiah 48:37
verses.text: For every head shall be bald, and every beard clipped: upon all the hands shall be cuttings, and upon the loins sackcloth.

verses.name: Jeremiah 48:38
verses.text: There shall be lamentation generally upon all the housetops of Moab, and in the streets thereof: for I have broken Moab like a vessel wherein is no pleasure, saith the Lord.

verses.name: Jeremiah 48:39
verses.text: They shall howl, saying, How is it broken down! how hath Moab turned the back with shame! so shall Moab be a derision and a dismaying to all them about him.
